document_data.name: Scroll of Protection from Divination
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scroll of protection from divination''''' was a [[magic]]al [[scroll]] found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: Reading this scroll created an area of protection centered around the caster, with a diameter of {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}. It protected the caster from all [[divination]] [[spell]]s.  Within the area of protection, divination spells were unable to be cast. The scroll offered no protection from abilities and spells that revealed magical properties.
